Weight Class

Weight Class

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

usWeightClass

OS/2 weight class values from 1 to 1000 are valid.

usWeightClass is '123'
Unified Monotype Weight Name Rules

Warning

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

usWeightClass

CSS only supports one of the following OS/2 weight class values '100, 200, 300, 400, 500, 600, 700, 800, 900'. If the font family has more than 9 weights, this does not work for any weight.

usWeightClass is '123'
Unified Monotype Weight Name Rules

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

usWeightClass

OS/2 weight class value according Monotype specifications

usWeightClass is '123', but should be '100'.
Unified Monotype Weight Name Rules

Check if bold.

It seems to be not bold.

head.macStyle.bold: False

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

usWeightClass

OS/2 weight class should be 400 for 'Regular' weight.

It seems this font is not the 'Regular' weight and usWeightclass is '123' ≠ '400'.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

hmtx

Advance

ZERO WIDTH SPACE advance width should be 0

Advance width is '600'

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

cmap

FEFF

ZERO WIDTH NO-BREAK SPACE: Missing FEFF in cmap table.

Required for Monotype library. Please add unicode FEFF. Custom work refer to spec.

Warning

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

cmap

00AD

Soft hyphen 00AD in cmap table.

Missing Soft hyphen 00AD in cmap table. Soft hyphen is often used in web and in professional print publishing software like Adobe InDesign.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

hmtx

Index 3 and 4

Advance width of nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) should match the space (uni0020) width.

Advance width nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) 600 ≠ space (uni0020) 272.
If the width matches the original font, it does not need to be changed.

Info

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

Advance width of 'thinspace' (uni2009) should be smaller than the width of space (uni0020).

Can not check, because no uni2009 in this font.

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

cmap

00AD

Soft hyphen 00AD in cmap table.

Missing Soft hyphen 00AD in cmap table. Soft hyphen is often used in web and in professional print publishing software like Adobe InDesign.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

hmtx

Index 3 and 4

Advance width of nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) should match the space (uni0020) width.

Advance width nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) 531 ≠ space (uni0020) 270.
If the width matches the original font, it does not need to be changed.

Info

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

cmap

uni2009

Advance width of 'thinspace' (uni2009) should be smaller than the width of space (uni0020).

Can not check, because no uni2009 in this font.

Info

Noto Sans Thai Looped Black Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Black.ttf)

cmap

uni2008

Advance width of 'PUNCTUATION SPACE' (uni2008) should be equal to the 'period' advance width.

Can not check, because no uni2008 in this font.

Index 1

'NULL' shoiuld have no contours.

'NULL' has 0 contours.

Error

hmtx

Index 1

'NULL' should have an advance width of 0.

'NULL' has an advance width of 600.
If the width matches the original font's index 1 width, it does not need to be changed.

glyf

Index 2

OK: 'CR' has 0 contours.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

hmtx

Index 2

Advance width of 'CR' should match the space width.

'CR' advance width '600' does not match the space width '272'.
If the width matches the original font's index 2 width, it does not need to be changed.

"nonmarkingreturn"

Index 2

'CR' should have no contours.

OK: 'CR' has 0 contours.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Medium Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Medium.ttf)

hmtx

Index 2

Advance width of 'CR' should match the space width.

'CR' advance width '260' does not match the space width '256'.
If the width matches the original font's index 2 width, it does not need to be changed.

OS/2

table version 4.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

OK: 'OS/2' table version is: 4.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the sTypo metrics and not usWin metrics the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be True.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag is True.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

WWS

If no NID 21 and 22, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True but is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

OK: 'OS/2' usLastCharIndex is 0xEC0B.

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the sTypo metrics and not usWin metrics the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be True.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag is True.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Bold Bold (NotoSansThaiLooped-Bold.ttf)

OS/2

WWS

If no NID 21 and 22, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True but is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Bold Bold (NotoSansThaiLooped-Bold.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Bold Bold (NotoSansThaiLooped-Bold.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

-/-

Obsolete language tag 'TUR' should be TRK.

OK: No language tag 'TUR' in any table.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'The Fontpad Ltd', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'The Fontpad Ltd' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Noto Sans Thai Looped' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Thin' = NID 1 'Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin'.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

Should be camel case Family NID1

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

Check style extentions Family NID1

Entry: 'Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight'
The style extention 'Ext' does not exist according Monotype standards.
Please ignore this if you have to be backwards compatible.
More infos here:
Subfamily Additions and their Abbreviations

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

Should be written in camel case Full Name NID4

Entry: 'Noto Sans Thai Looped Extralight'
The word 'Extralight' should be written in camel case.
Please ignore this if you have to be backwards compatible.
More infos here:
Unified Monotype Weight Name Rules

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

Check style extentions Full Name NID4

NID 4 contains correct campel case: 'Extra'

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name/OS/2

MS NID 4

Width Names Full Name NID4

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Noto Sans Thai Looped Extralight'

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name/head

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.00' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.0'.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 5

NID 5 'MS/BMP/English (U.S.)' should match 'MS/BMP/English (U.S.)'.

NID 5 is the same 'Version 1.00' = 'Version 1.00'.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '29' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansThaiLooped-Extralight'

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansThaiLooped-Extralight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansThaiLooped-Extralight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in Postscript NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in Postscript NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Should be written in camel case Postscript NID6

Entry: 'NotoSansThaiLooped-Extralight'
The word 'Extralight' should be written in camel case.
Please ignore this if you have to be backwards compatible.
More infos here:
Unified Monotype Weight Name Rules

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

NID 6 'MS/BMP/English (U.S.)' should match 'MS/BMP/English (U.S.)'.

NID 6 is the same 'NotoSansThaiLooped-Extralight' = 'NotoSansThaiLooped-Extralight'.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Noto is a trademark of Google LLC.'
but what do think about this
'Noto is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'The Fontpad Ltd', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.google.com/get/noto, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.fontpad.co.uk, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'The Fontpad Ltd' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Thai Looped Extralight' ≠ 'Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped ExtLight Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Italic, Extra, Light, Black, Thin, Wide, Ultra'

Pass

name

Mac names

Mac name table entries are not necessary anymore.

This font has no Mac name table entries. This is correct.
Further read: App test: no Mac name table

Noto Sans Thai Looped Light Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2020 Google LLC. All rights reserved'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2020 Google LLC. All rights reserved'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

name

'Noto Sans Thai Looped Regular'

Noto Sans Thai Looped Regular Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications. Style linking and/or font embedding for MS Word won't work.

The keyword 'Regular' may cause issues in Microsoft Office applications. Style linking and/or font embedding for MS Word won't work.
(If 'Bold' has no Regular and you thought to make a single font out of it by bringing 'Bold' into NID 1 and making NID 2 to 'Regular': This cause cross platform issues in MS Word for Mac and PC. Dec. 2018)

Pass

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Regular Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansThaiLooped-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Regular Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansThaiLooped-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Noto is a trademark of Google LLC.'
but what do think about this
'Noto is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Regular Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'The Fontpad Ltd', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Regular Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.google.com/get/noto, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Regular Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.fontpad.co.uk, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Regular Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'The Fontpad Ltd' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Regular Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Medium Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansThaiLooped-Medium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Medium Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansThaiLooped-Medium', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Noto is a trademark of Google LLC.'
but what do think about this
'Noto is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Medium Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'The Fontpad Ltd', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Medium Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.google.com/get/noto, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Medium Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.fontpad.co.uk, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Medium Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'The Fontpad Ltd' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Medium Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Medium Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Medium Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Noto Sans Thai Looped' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Medium' = NID 1 'Noto Sans Thai Looped Medium'.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Semibold Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

Should be written in camel case Family NID1

Entry: 'Noto Sans Thai Looped Semibold'
The word 'Semibold' should be written in camel case.
Please ignore this if you have to be backwards compatible.
More infos here:
Unified Monotype Weight Name Rules

Pass

MS NID 8 is 'The Fontpad Ltd', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Semibold Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.google.com/get/noto, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Semibold Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.fontpad.co.uk, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Semibold Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'The Fontpad Ltd' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Semibold Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Semibold Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Thai Looped Semibold Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Thai Looped SemiBold' ≠ 'Noto Sans Thai Looped Semibold' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Semibold Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

'Noto Sans Thai Looped'

Mac names

This font has no Mac name table entries. This is correct.

Noto Sans Thai Looped Bold Bold (NotoSansThaiLooped-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2020 Google LLC. All rights reserved'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Bold Bold (NotoSansThaiLooped-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '23'
'NotoSansThaiLooped-Bold'

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Bold Bold (NotoSansThaiLooped-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansThaiLooped-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Bold Bold (NotoSansThaiLooped-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansThaiLooped-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Bold Bold (NotoSansThaiLooped-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in Postscript NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

but what do think about this
'Noto is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

name

MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2020 Google LLC. All rights reserved'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

name

MS NID 1

Should be written in camel case Family NID1

Entry: 'Noto Sans Thai Looped Extrabold'
The word 'Extrabold' should be written in camel case.
Please ignore this if you have to be backwards compatible.
More infos here:
Unified Monotype Weight Name Rules

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Extrabold Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '28' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansThaiLooped-Extrabold'

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Extrabold Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansThaiLooped-Extrabold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Extrabold Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansThaiLooped-Extrabold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Extrabold Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraBold.ttf)

but what do think about this

Noto Sans Thai Looped Extrabold Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'The Fontpad Ltd', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Extrabold Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

NID 11 is http://www.google.com/get/noto, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Extrabold Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Extrabold Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'The Fontpad Ltd' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Extrabold Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Extrabold Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Extrabold Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Noto Sans Thai Looped' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Extrabold' = NID 1 'Noto Sans Thai Looped Extrabold'.

Pass

name

Noto Sans Thai Looped Black Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '24'
'NotoSansThaiLooped-Black'

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Black Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansThaiLooped-Black', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Black Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansThaiLooped-Black', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Noto is a trademark of Google LLC.'
but what do think about this
'Noto is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Black Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'The Fontpad Ltd', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Black Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.google.com/get/noto, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Black Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.fontpad.co.uk, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Black Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'The Fontpad Ltd' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Black Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Black Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Black Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Noto Sans Thai Looped' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Black' = NID 1 'Noto Sans Thai Looped Black'.

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Black Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Black.ttf)

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

GPOS

kern feature

Simple technical test if kern feature in GPOS table. This cannot replace a visual kerning validation.

The font has GPOS kerning.

Error

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in font.
Further reading: Kern table

TTF is missing a 'kern' table. This is required for custom fonts and recommended for Library fonts (only TTF not CFF), because PowerPoint still does not support GPOS kerning (Nov. 2020)

Pass

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

OS/2 and head

sTypeAsc/Desc and unitsPerEm

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value.

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (1600) match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (1000).

Info

hhea.descent: -350
hhea.lineGap: 0

Noto Sans Thai Looped Thin Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

Vertical Metrics

Pull OS/2 usWin Metrics

OS2.usWinAscent: 1380
OS2.usWinDescent: 620

hhea

advanceWidthMax

Get advanceWidthMax.

advanceWidthMax = 1666.

Info

Noto Sans Thai Looped Black Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-Black.ttf)

hhea

xMin, yMin, xMax, yMax

Get xMin, yMin, xMax, yMax.

xMin: -626
yMin: -564
xMax: 1631
yMax: 1277

uni0E29.BRACKET.110'

Warning

Noto Sans Thai Looped Semibold Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-SemiBold.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Is longer:
'maiHanaKat_maitaikhuthai.narrow'

Pass

Noto Sans Thai Looped Semibold Regular (NotoSansThaiLooped-SemiBold.ttf)

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.
